Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2008 09:57PM Sonny2727 wrote: Yes I have someone who overlooks my seizures and I have to say she is cancered out. She has had over 7 friends who went thru breast cancer just this year. So I have not told her. She has enough to just take care of my meds and my movement problems after a seizure. All my muscles get involved. Plus my meds make me helucinate. I see things she does not. They took my drivers License away. I take the city buses everywhere. The doctor I called tonight did my Histerectomy and will get something going Monday for me I hope. Thank you it feels good talking about it. I am home alone tonight and it is hard to focus. This is helping so much. I will let you all know everthing that happens. Be Well Sonny.
Posts.Title: Hard Stationary lump that hurts Sonny2727 Sonny2727

Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2008 07:42AM Sonny2727 wrote: thank you for writing. No my other breat is fine that I know of. I did get comfort here last night. I slept good. I thought of the brave women on this site that heard the dreaded words that we so not want to hear. They took time to help us knowing we still have a chance to not hear those words. I give all the women on this site so much credit. I can not imagine what you are all going thru. I wathed my friends go thru some bad stuff with Breast Cancer. I am glad you have this site. Be Well all of you. Sonny.

Posts.Content: Sonny2727 wrote: Hello I am Sonny (Female) I have a very hard stationary lump that hurt and the ribs under the lump and breast hurt so bad I can not wear a bra and it hurts to sit. My doctor on finding the lump said ( oh this does not feel right, we have to go after this aggresivly.) This was three weeks ago and she mailed my mamogram appt for May 20. Way far away. That is not agressivly. That is terrible. I am on meds for Seizures and I am sapose to stay calm. Calm I am not and My Seizures have advanced. They are Grand Mal and very violent. I am beside myself. I called another Doctor and he might go faster. I begged the Doctor who found it to move up my appt  and she never calls me back. Three times I have called and no response. She is a resident not a Doctor yet. Hope some one can calm me down. Thank You Sonny. Log in to post a reply
